title: Microsoft Azure Administrator
headline: Learn all you need to know about Microsoft Azureâ€™s cloud and on-premises infrastructure in this free online course.
description: An Azure administrator often serves as part of a larger team dedicated to implementing an organisation's cloud infrastructure. This free online course aims to prepare you for the Az-104 Microsoft Azure Administrator certification. In addition, learn the benefits of Azure identity management solutions and how to develop and scale new applications in Azure. Discover all you need to know about the Azure infrastructure and enrol now.
courseDescription:
Cloud-based applications and platforms drive global business growth by serving as the infrastructural backbone of Info-Tech corporations and modern businesses. We cannot overemphasise the contributions of these platforms and applications to business processes and functions because they have revolutionised the business landscape in this information age. Microsoft Azure platform offers identity management solutions, administrative tools, networking and monitoring infrastructures that support all industries. From mini and micro business enterprises to Fortune 500 companies, Microsoft Azure provides users with the flexibility to use their preferred tools and services via open-source technologies.

Users can select any service from the Azure hi-tech infrastructures to develop and scale new applications, while options for running existing applications in the public cloud also exist. This course will examine the nitty-gritty and advanced modules of Microsoft Azure, Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) and Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS). We will explain how Azure AD helps users simplify Windows deployment and access to apps and resources. We will also highlight the benefits of Azure AD Connect, an essential tool for on-premises cloud identities.

Finally, you will learn about command-line management, including additional options like the Azure mobile app and Representational State Transfer Application Programming Interface (REST API). We will also present Azure AD management tools, user account types and other vital features of Microsoft cloud applications. This course is packed with hands-on video demonstrations and mock tests to help you master the technicalities of the Microsoft cloud computing applications. We will also prepare you for the Az-104 Microsoft Azure Administrator examination. So start learning how to become a Microsoft-certified administrator!
